name: Eva
text: Greetings, traveler

name: Player
text: W-Woah! Who are you? And an even better question, WHAT are you?

name: Eva
text: My name is Eva, I am the princess of the mirror world. I am pretty much a thing even I can't explain.

name: Player
text: I do not quite understand.

name: Eva
text: I see you are not aware of the mirror world and it's power. Allow me to inform you.

name: Eva
text: The mirror world is… a replica of your world, except everyone is the opposite of their world counterpart. Good becomes evil, and evil becomes good.

name: Player
text: Alright... why are you telling me this?

name: Eva
text: I have a request to make...

name: Eva
text: The mirror world and your world are in… great danger…

name: Player
text: Danger?

name: Eva
text: A threat that our kind is not strong enough for…

name: Eva
text: It's a young warrior...

name: Eva
text: He was part of an organization known as the Resistance, a powerful group known for having many wars with our kind. He was the second strongest soldier out of all of them...

name: Eva
text: We managed to fight back when the group was asleep.

name: Eva
text: He managed to survive, and has gone mad at the sight of seeing his fallen comrades.

name: Eva
text: He came in our world instead, and started visciously attacking our kind, with seemingly no end. We couldn't stop him...

name: Player
text: Y-You want me to...?

name: Player
text: How do you expect me to...

name: Eva
text: I will assist you in combat. I will put all my faith into you.

name: Eva
text: There's your very first enemy you can train on!

name: Eva
text: Take it down, and continue your journey... be quick...

name: Eva
text: I-I'll just be safe in your shadow

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Eva
text: T-That's him!

name: Player
text: He… doesn't look that threatening

name: Player
text: I… take back what I said.

name: Eva
text: Be careful... he has become a deranged psychopath.

name: Void
text: Kill...

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Eva
text: Phew…

name: Player
text: That wasn't easy…

name: Eva
text: He's not done, make sure to find him again!

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Player
text: What happened to him?!

name: Eva
text: I don't know! Get ready.

name: Eva
text: You know what to do [Player]!

name: Void
text: Eva… I will demolish your kind for your actions...

name: Player
text: Get back you beast!

name: Void
text: I... am the beast? ME? The only beast here is your ALLY.

name: Eva
text: He's corrupted and speaking nonesense! [Player], get ready! I'll assist you!

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Eva
text: phew...

name: Void
text: Grr…

name: Player
text: That was close…

name: Eva
text: He should be weaker, but not weak enough… [Player]! We can finish him next time. Here, take t-

name: Player
text: E-Eva!

name: Eva
text: [player…] please… Go on w-without me…

name: Player
text: No no! I can't continue without you! You've taught me everything!

name: Eva
text: Please... Make sure to knock whatever is in him out... Something inside him has grown stronger because of this world, that is why he is hostile.

name: Eva
text: All I ask of y-you... is to contain... your anger... and keep him alive... he can be of great value...

name: Player
text: B-but...

name: Player
text: Eva!!

name: Player
text: S-She's… gone...

name: Void
text: Do you have any idea what you were fighting with?

name: Void
text: Do you have ANY idea what I've gone through in order to get to where I am?

name: Void
text: She was using you, just go weaken our orginization, and then take over your world.

name: Player
text: What?

name: Void
text: She just... had to get rid of me last... and she failed.

name: Player
text: How did you survive?

name: Void
text: I'm not human. I'm partially demonic. It's a powerful trait of mine.

name: Player
text: Elaborate.

name: Void
text: It is what allowed me to survive. This.. does not mean I get 100% control over my body... Sometimes...

name: Void
text: Let's fight...

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Void
text: Don't

name: Player
text: Tell me the truth.

name: Void
text: I was speaking the truth, Eva was indeed using you in order to regain turf...

name: Void
text: I... lost control after seeing my comrades dead...

name: Void
text: I could see a dark figure... it was talking to me, but I did not understand what it said...

name: Player
text: Hm...

name: Player
text: You have been corrupted by the small part inside you, haven't you?

name: Void
text: I-I don't understand… Why don't I remember any of my actions..?

name: Player
text: Don't ask me.

name: Void
text: M-My other... half... I just... cannot control it.

name: Player
text: Where do you think you're going?!

name: Void
text: I-I think it's better if I… go... It's too dangerous if I stick around you...

name: Player
text: Hey! Wait up y-

name: Player
text: He's gone…

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT

name: Void
text: Oh… it's you…

name: Player
text: You look absolutely horrible.

name: Void
text: I'm feeling quite fine.

name: Void
text: *coughing*

name: Player
text: Yeah… right.

name: Void
text: *sighs*

name: Void
text: Why did you spare me.

name: Player
text: You came back to your senses, it only felt right.

name: Void
text: If you want to kill me, it's fine. I have nothing to live for anyways.

name: Player
text: I won't. Besides, I have a couple of questions for you anyways.

name: Void
text: I would be happier if you did, but what are your questions?

name: Player
text: Why did you join the resistance?

name: Void
text: When I was little... I lived in a horrible household. It was because of my species after a blood test.

name: Void
text: When I was little... I lived in a horrible household. It was because of my species after a blood test.

name: Void
text: My mother did not... like this, as she was a bit religious. This.. meant I was locked in a closet, which was my primary room.

name: Void
text: I got beatings, got yelled every day... something about being the son of the devil... Not that I care. She screamed at me for my lack of emotions.

name: Void
text: My sister has always loved me, and always cared for me behind moms back. it was the her that made me maintain the strength to keep hanging on.

name: Void
text: One day... mom came home with a knife, telling me there was a way to cure whatever I was and... stabbed me in the eye. Miraculously, I survived, with my sisters assistance when mom left me bleeding.

name: Void
text: Eventually, the police found me when they were at the door and I screamed for help...

name: Void
text: Mom was arrested and my sister and I were put up for adoption...

name: Void
text: My sister was adopted immediately, which left me alone.. No friends, no one that cares about me, no one...

name: Void
text: So I escaped... into the woods... and that's when...

name: Player
text: You found the Resistance...

name: Void
text: They found me, to say it like that.

name: Void
text: They took care of me, and teached me many things. They didn't care what I was. For once, it finally felt like I had a family. A real Family I could trust.

name: Void
text: But now...

name: Void
text: I have no one...

name: Void
text: I'm alone again

name: Void
text: I'm worth absolutely nothing. I have lived as an outcast my entire life.

name: Void
text: Do you know what it feels like to be judged on what species you are? Do you know the pain of having to know you're different?

name: Void
text: DO YOU KNOW HOW IT FEELS TO FIGHT FOR YOUR OWN LIFE EVERY SINGLE DAY!?

name: Void
text: *chuckles*

name: Void
text: It was nice having you around for these couple minutes.

name: Void
text: It's just not worth it for me anymore. I have lost everyone I cared about...

name: Void
text: All gone...

name: Void
text: All because I'm half a demonic being... along with that... thing... within me.

name: Player
text: Please, don't. There's so much more to live for...
*he makes a slashing motion towards his neck*

name: Player
text: WHY DID YOU DO THAT?!

name: Player
text: DON'T YOU VALUE ANYTHING IN YOUR LIFE?

name: Player
text: YOUR SISTER STILL LOVES YOU! DON'T YOU WANT TO SEE HER AGAIN?

name: Player
text: Please… stay with me… until you can find her...

name: Player
text: I promise you that no one will ever judge you on what you are, and that your sins will be forgiven.

name: Player
text: I know it will be hard to believe coming from the person who attacked, and almost killed you, but... give me a chance...

name: Player
text: I don't want to feel the guilt of leaving you behind, especially when you're like this.

name: Player
text: Please, take my hand you cutie, I'll try my best.

name: Player
text: Let us find a way for you to be accepted, together.

name: Void
text: O-okay...

name: BREAKPOINT
text: BREAKPOINT
